product_name: Kokatat Hydrus 3L Tempest Paddling Pants - Men's
long_description: Paddling whenever you have the chance means that sometimes you have to go during less-than-ideal weather. Stay dry and love your time on the water in the Kokatat Hydrus 3L Tempest paddling pants. Hydrus 3L waterproof breathable coating keeps you dry in high seas and extreme weather. Outer nylon fabric face resists abrasion and inner knit lining moves moisture away from skin. Neoprene waistband with rip-and-stick tabs dials in the fit. Gravel guards are designed to fit over paddling booties and keep grit and pebbles from entering.
short_description: Paddling whenever you have the chance means that sometimes you have to go during less-than-ideal weather. Stay dry and love your time on the water in the Kokatat Hydrus 3L Tempest paddling pants.
